column38: Reads were aligned to the hg19 build of the human genome using Bowtie V 1.1.2 with the following arguments
column39: Peaks were called using macs2 V 2.1.0.20140616 with the following arguments
column42: Libraries were constructed as described in ATAC-seq

column12: Cells were treated with 100 nM dexamethasone, 10 nM 17-beta-estradiol, or vehicle control (DMSO) for 1 hour prior to trypsinization.
column13: Ishikawa cells were grown in phenol red-free RPMI-1640 media supplemented with 10% charcoal/dextran treated fetal bovine serum and 50 units/mL penicillin and 50 µg/mL streptomycin for at least 4 days before treatment.
column15: Treated cells were trypsinized and purified by centrifugation before being place in nuclei isolation buffer (lysis buffer) containing 0.1% IGEPAL. Nuclei were then counted and 250,000 cells were used in ATAC-seq library preparation
column41: Excel file,  Chromosome, start, stop, length, summit, pvalue, fold_enrichment, qvalue and name values for peaks called by macs2
column42: A Method for Assaying Chromatin Accessibility Genome-Wide by Buenrostro et al.  2015 Curr Proc Mol Biol
